sentences.sContent: Ascending the shaky ladder to the scaffold, More addressed the executioner.
sentences.sCn: 摩尔沿着摇摇晃晃的梯子登上绞刑台，跟行刑人说了话。

words.tran: 脚手架；搭脚手架的材料

trans.tranOther: a structure built next to a wall, for workers to stand on while they build, repair, or paint a building

trans.tranCn: 给…搭脚手架；用支架支撑
